page.title: 09INTERESTING PLACES
page.content: {Hermand House The estate is in Harburn,West Calder.The house was built by George Ferguson who was born in 1743.The house was built on a dreary countryside and stood on its own until the village grew to meet it.The house was built in 1797 as George wanted to live there with his wife and family.It stood for 176 years before it was destroyed by fire.Today the house is being rebuilt and converted into flats.The rebuilding began in 1984 and should be completed by the end 1985. {The Five Sisters Although not a building they are an interesting landmark.These hills sprang up at the time of shale mining and are made of excess shale.They are not hills as we know them but man made "bings."
